name: Corteva Agriscience/DuPont International Operations SARL
membership: Corteva Agriscience is member of European Crop Protection Association, European Seed Association, EuropaBio, International Biocontrol Manufacturers Association as well as related national associations
goal:

interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files followed by the organisation:

Activities in the policy areas of agriculture and legislation relevant for crop protection products, biotechnology and seeds.

Corteva Agriscience also follows policy discussions on the environment, trade, development, innovation and research.
